page.title: 11MRS. KENYON-SLANEY
page.content: One of the local characters is the owner of the largest estate in the study area,Mrs Kenyon-Slaney.Mrs Kenyon-Slaney lives in Hatton Grange and manages the 20,000acres of the Hatton Estate along with her estate manager.Each acre is worth Â£2,00-.Mrs Kenyon-Slaney is in her forties and has three children but sadly her husband died last year(1984).Her days are very busy.In the morning she has to sort out all the mail before allocating tasks to her staff.She does some cleaning and even though there are 25 rooms she does much herself.As the morning progresses she meets visitors,sales reps and deals with matters regarding the committee for Handicapped Children of which she is chairman.She spends the rest of the day doing the jobs she has to and taking part in her hobbies.
